title: Yahoo search
content: I want to remove the Yahoo search engine but the remove tab is not highlighted or blocked somehow.
creator: miloah

title: Fedex tracking fails in Firefox
content: I can not get Firefox version 111.0.1 to work with Fedex tracking system. I get a message from Fedex saying "Unfortunately we are unable to retrieve your tracking results at this time. Please try again later." But when I use Microsoft Edge I get all my tracking information. I have cleared the cache for Fedex but that does not work. I have had this same problem with UPS also.
creator: nance_c123

title: YAHOO WIDER MAIL EXTENSION ICON MISSING
content: I HAVE YAHOO WIDER MAIL EXTENSION IN FIREFOX & HAVE BEEN USING IT FOR SEVERAL YEARS BUT NOW THERE IS NO ICON IN MY MENU BAR FOR YAHOO MAIL. YAHOO IS STILL MY DEFAULT SEARCH ENGINE. WHAT CAN I DO? IT SAID TO MAKE SURE & RELOAD YOUR YAHOO MAIL PAGE AFTER INSTALLATION WHICH REALLY ISN'T MY ISSUE BUT WOULD IT HELP, z& IF SO, HOW DO I DO THAT? P.S. I'M NOT SCREAMING, I CAN JUST SEE CAPS BETTER. cindyraymoss@gmail.com or cindymoss@rocketmail.com (an old yahoo address)
creator: cindyraymoss

title: El navegador siempre pierde las contraseñas. Por que.
content: El navegador siempre pierde las contraseñas. Por que.

title: Restoring Bookmarks
content: When restoring bookmarks, why isn't the user given the option to restore them to a location other than where the current bookmarks are?
creator: mark.w.mahaffey

title: Restaurar abas
content: Boa noite. Meu SO deu problema com uma atualização e tive que formatar sem ter bkp. Minhas abas estão sincronizadas no Firefox com a minha conta mas não consigo restaurar a seção depois que reinstalei tudo. Existe alguma forma de recuperar a seção além de abrir aba por aba pelo histórico? Obrigado.
creator: romulo.dimas
